com.gcu.business

Class MusicBusinessService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gcu.business.MusicBusinessService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MusicBusinessInterface<AlbumModel,SongModel>

    public class MusicBusinessService
extends java.lang.Object
implements MusicBusinessInterface<AlbumModel,SongModel>
    Implementation of a product business service that can handle business logic related to products

            allEntries=true)
public boolean addAlbum(AlbumModel album)

      • addSong

public boolean addSong(SongModel song)
                                                                                                                throws ItemAlreadyExistsException,
                                                                                                                       ItemNotFoundException
        Method to add a song to the database of products
        Specified by:
        addSong in interface MusicBusinessInterface<AlbumModel,SongModel>
        Parameters:
        song - The song to be added
        Returns:
        boolean Whether or not the song was successfully added
        Throws:
        ItemAlreadyExistsException - This exception is thrown in the event that the supplied song already exists in the database, and duplicates are not allowed
        ItemNotFoundException - This exception is thrown in the event that the user is attempting to add a track to an album that does not exist
